FeedBackModal.title: How can we help you?
FeedBackModal.intro: Select an option below to get started. We're here to assist you!

ReportBug.title: Report a Bug
ReportBug.description: Please describe the bug you encountered, and we will work to resolve it as soon as possible.
ReportBug.currentPageQuestion: Is the bug on the current page?
ReportBug.bugLocation: Can you tell us where the bug is?

RequestFeature.title: Request a Feature
RequestFeature.description: Please fill out the form below to request a new feature.
RequestFeature.describeFeature: Describe the feature you would like to request
RequestFeature.currentPageQuestion: Is the feature request related to the current page?
RequestFeature.FeatureLocation: Can you tell us where you would like the feature to be implemented?

RequestHelp.title: Request Help
RequestHelp.description: Please fill out the form below to request assistance or support.
RequestHelp.enterHelpTitle: Enter the topic of your request
RequestHelp.describeHelp: Describe the issue or question you need help with
RequestHelp.currentPageQuestion: Is your request related to the current page?
RequestHelp.HelpLocation: Can you tell us where you are experiencing this issue?

ProvideFeedback.title: Provide Feedback
ProvideFeedback.description: We value your feedback. Please fill out the form below to help us improve.
ProvideFeedback.currentPageQuestion: Is this feedback related to the current page?
